reviews.text: Where shall I start the staff are not very nice they are rude this is because  they refused us to go to the toilet what if a pregnant diabetic woman wanted to go in there it's truly unfair I hate the place it's very disgusting it's vile and its nasty I hope something gets done about this
Not a modern looking station but clean and tidy and the staff are helpful.

Used this station about 4 times now.  Nice old style, clean and tidy and very helpful staff.  

Well located for the town and lots of taxis available outside at reasonable prices. 

Can get quite busy in peak season.  Not too many facilities available at the station.

Came here for journey home back to barnham, went to ticket office to ask if there is a toilet on platform she said we don’t have public toilets and the man at the gate said you can use the toilets on the train( obviously) but when we were on platform we saw a sign saying public toilets which we did use so why did they say they don’t have any toilets on the platform? Are we not meant to use them?
